column5: Welcome to the fifth annual Criterion Challenge, hosted by Ben and featuring his original list, where we celebrate The Criterion Collection! Started: 1/1/25 Watched: 19/52 Completed: 36% There are 52 categories. The goal is to watch any Criterion released film based on the categories below between 1/1/25-12/31/25. The films can be watched daily, weekly, or monthly, and in any order. Watch them at your own pace, but remember you have to finish by 12/31/25. In my first participation here, I'll try to ensure that all the films are first-time watches, except for two or three, but this is subject to change if they are difficult to access. Don't forget to visit The Criterion Collection for all your film needs! Now, the most important… Categories and my picks: 1. Watch a film from the CC40 Boxset - 花樣年華 | In the Mood for Love 2. Watch a film from the year you were born - My Own Private Idaho 3. Directed by Robert Altman - Short Cuts 4. Watch a film that would be your first choice in the Criterion Closet - Beau Travail 5. Great Soundtracks - Risky Business 6. John Turturro’s Adventures in Moviegoing - Rocco e i suoi fratelli | Rocco and His Brothers 7. 1920s - The Kid 8. Watch a film that will be added to the physical collection in 2025 - Drugstore Cowboy 9. 1930s - Shanghai Express 10. Andrew Garfield’s Closet Picks - Brazil 11. 1940s - Citizen Kane 12. Celine Song’s Top 10 - The Celebration 13. 1950s - The 400 Blows 14. Watch a film from the Criterion Channel’s all time favorites lists - Mulholland Drive 15. 1960s - Romeo and Juliet 16. Watch a film that is currently out of print from the physical collection - Chungking Express 17. 1970s - Quadrophenia 18. William Friedkin’s Closet Picks - 8½ 19. 1980s - Tootsie 20. Spine #451-499 - The Curious Case of Benjamin Button 21. 1990s - Nowhere 22. Documentary - Bob Dylan: Dont Look Back 23. 2000s - Before Sunset 24. Janus Contemporaries - L'été dernier | Last Summer 25. 2010s - Sound of Metal 26. Bill Hader’s Second Closet Picks - Secrets & Lies 27. 2020s - Anatomy of a Fall 28. Noir and Neonoir - Blow Out 29. All Time Top Criterion Closet Picks - The Piano Teacher 30. Criterion Releases Never Picked in the Closet - Totally F***ed Up 31. North American film - Frances Ha 32. Ayo Edebiri’s Closet Picks - Thief 33. Wim Wenders’ Adventures in Moviegoing - Le Petit Soldat 34. South American film - La Ciénaga 35. Random Number Generator (Google random number generator, set values from 1 to whatever number Criterion has listed last here. This number will change as more releases are announced so please keep up to date by using the link I have provided as I will not be updating each time Criterion makes announcements. Watch whatever movie corresponds to the spine number you are given.) - Gomorrah 493 36. AAPI Filmmakers - Chop Shop 37. Watch a film shorter than 80 minutes - Old Joy 38. European film - Fish Tank 39. Cult Movies - Ghost World 40. Isabella Rossellini’s Adventures in Moviegoing - Italianamerican 41. Winona Ryder’s Closet Picks - A Woman Under the Influence 42. African film - Eyimofe (This Is My Desire) 43. John Carpenter’s Top 10 - Dead Ringers 44. Horror - Funny Games 45. Asian film - Taste of Cherry 46. Dark Comedies - Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas 47. Rachel Kushner’s Adventures in Moviegoing - Wanda 48. Australian film - Picnic at Hanging Rock 49. Female Filmmakers - Dogfight 50. Ben Wheatley’s Closet Picks - Rumble Fish 51. A film by a director whose work you have not seen before - Smooth Talk 52. Watch any Criterion film from your watchlist - The Silence of the Lambs Helpful Links: The Complete Criterion Collection The Criterion Collection by Spine Number Every Film Available on The Criterion Channel Please use the tags "cc2025" and “criterion challenge 2025” so that we can keep track of everything, and link your lists in the comments below. Have fun!
